title: Revel Rascal 130mm 29er now rolling out of Colorado in “Love Your Brain” Purple
content:
Revel Bikes have added a new “Love Your Brain” Purple option for their 29er trail bike, the Rascal. It joins the T1000 Liquid Metal and Sedona colorways, leaving riders with the choice of three sweet-looking paint jobs for this 130mm travel trail bike. Revel Rascal in “Love Your Brain” Purple Until now, there has been […]

The post Revel Rascal 130mm 29er now rolling out of Colorado in “Love Your Brain” Purple appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
